lyrics.stanza: In spirit and reality We meet to worship Thee, And every principality Must fall down or must flee. Reality, reality, O what a joy to see, That Christ may be enjoyed by us As our reality.

A Person, Thou hast come in us, Into our spirit now, And quickened us until we know Our inner man art Thou. O praise Thee, Lord, we sense Thee thus, Forever inwardly; Thy Person in each one of us Is our reality.
